trans-unit.source: Creates a control that displays an image on a page.
trans-unit.target: 建立影像顯示在頁面的控制項。

trans-unit.source: When a hot spot region defined within the ImageMap control is clicked, the control either generates a postback to the server or navigates to a specified URL.
trans-unit.target: 按一下 ImageMap 控制項內定義的作用點區域時，控制項產生回傳至伺服器，或是瀏覽至指定的 URL。

trans-unit.source: In this topic: - [Introduction](#introduction) - [Accessibility](#accessibility) - [Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## Introduction Use the ImageMap control to create an image that contains defined hot spot regions.
trans-unit.target: 本主題內容:-[簡介](#introduction) - [協助工具](#accessibility) - [宣告式語法](#declarative_syntax) # # 簡介使用 ImageMap 控制項來建立映像，其中包含已定義的作用點區域。

trans-unit.source: When a user clicks a hot spot region, the control can either generate a postback to the server or navigate to a specified URL.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按一下的作用點區域時，控制項可以產生回傳至伺服器，或瀏覽至指定的 URL。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use this control to display a map of a geographical region.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用這個控制項來顯示地理區域的地圖。

trans-unit.source: When a user clicks a specific region on the map, the control navigates to a URL that provides additional data about the selected region.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按一下特定的區域在地圖上時，控制項巡覽至提供其他選取的區域相關資料的 URL。

trans-unit.source: You can also use this control to generate a postback to the server and run specific code based on the hot spot region that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用這個控制項產生回傳至伺服器並執行已按下作用點區域為基礎的特定程式碼。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use an ImageMap control to capture user responses such as votes.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以使用 ImageMap 控制項擷取使用者回應，例如投票。

trans-unit.source: When a user clicks the hot spot region defined for yes votes, code is called to record a yes response in a database.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按一下定義為 [是] 投票的作用點區域時，程式碼會呼叫在資料庫中記錄回應 [是]。

trans-unit.source: When a user clicks on the hot spot region defined for no votes, a no response is recorded.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按一下定義為沒有投票的作用點區域時，會記錄沒有回應。

trans-unit.source: You can also mix these two scenarios within a single ImageMap control.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以混用單一 ImageMap 控制項中的這兩種情況。

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify one hot spot region to navigate to a URL and another hot spot region to post back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 例如，您可以指定一個作用點區域瀏覽至 URL 和另一個回傳至伺服器的作用點區域。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A> property to specify the path to the image to display for the ImageMap control.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A>屬性來指定要為 ImageMap 控制項顯示影像的路徑。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can define any number of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> objects within an ImageMap control.
trans-unit.target: 您可以定義任何數目的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>ImageMap 控制項內的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PolygonHotSpot> classes to define hot spot regions.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PolygonHotSpot>類別定義作用點區域。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PolygonHotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.RectangleHotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CircleHotSpot>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can derive from the abstract <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> class to define your own custom hot spot object.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以衍生自抽象<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>類別來定義您自己自訂的作用點物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: There are two ways to specify the behavior of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object in an ImageMap control when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 有兩種方式來指定的行為<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>ImageMap 中的物件負責控制何時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>按下。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: You can use either the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A> property on the ImageMap control or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A> property on an individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A>ImageMap 控制項上的屬性或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A>屬性針對個別<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: These properties are set using one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotMode> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 這些屬性會設定使用其中一種<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotMode>列舉值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotMode>

trans-unit.source: If both properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A> property specified on each individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object takes precedence over the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A> property on the ImageMap control.
trans-unit.target: 如果已設定這兩個屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A>指定每個個別屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>物件會優先於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A>ImageMap 控制項上的屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: To navigate to a URL, set either the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `HotSpotMode.Navigate`.
trans-unit.target: 若要巡覽至 URL，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性`HotSpotMode.Navigate`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.NavigateUrl%2A> property to specify the URL to navigate to.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.NavigateUrl%2A>屬性來指定要瀏覽至 URL。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.NavigateUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: To generate a postback to the server, set either the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to `HotSpotMode.Postback`.
trans-unit.target: 若要產生回傳至伺服器，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性`HotSpotMode.Postback`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A> property to specify a name for the hot spot region.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A>屬性，以指定的作用點區域的名稱。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: This name will be passed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs> event data when a postback event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 此名稱將會傳入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs>時就會發生回傳事件的事件資料。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When a postback <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> is clicked, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 當回傳<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>按一下時，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click>就會引發事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: To programmatically control the actions performed when a postback <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> is clicked, provide an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要以程式設計方式控制執行動作時回傳<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>是按下，提供的事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: To cause all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> objects in an ImageMap control to have the same behavior, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property to specify the behavior.
trans-unit.target: 若要讓所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>物件具有相同的行為，ImageMap 控制項中使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性來指定行為。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: Then, either set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property on each individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object to `HotSpotMode.NotSet` or do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 然後，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>上每個個別屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>物件`HotSpotMode.NotSet`或不指定值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To specify different behaviors for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> objects in an ImageMap, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property on each individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object to either `HotSpotMode.Navigate` or `HotSpotMode.PostBack`.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定不同的行為，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>ImageMap 中的物件設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>上每個個別屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>物件設為 `HotSpotMode.Navigate`或`HotSpotMode.PostBack`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If an ImageMap control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property on any of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> objects it contains is set to `HotSpotMode.NotSet` or is not set to a value, by default the behavior is `HotSpotMode.Navigate`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果 ImageMap 控制項的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>上的任何屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>它所包含的物件設定為`HotSpotMode.NotSet`或預設的行為是未設定值，為`HotSpotMode.Navigate`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: ## Accessibility For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: # # 有關如何設定這個控制項，使其產生標記，並符合協助工具標準，協助工具的資訊，請參閱[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的協助工具](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Declarative Syntax ```                                        ```
trans-unit.target: # # 宣告式語法```                                        ```

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個建構函式來初始化<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>的新執行個體

trans-unit.source: Adds the HTML attributes and styles of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control to be rendered to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 將 HTML 屬性和樣式<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref>要呈現控制項的指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers to insert the appropriate attributes and styles to the <xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter?displayProperty=fullName> output stream for an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法由控制項開發人員主要是用來插入適當的屬性和樣式以<xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter?displayProperty=fullName>的輸出資料流<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AddAttributesToRender%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AddAttributesToRender%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.AddAttributesToRender%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that represents the output stream to render HTML content on the client.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> ，代表要呈現 HTML 內容的用戶端上的輸出資料流。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> object in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 發生時<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref>物件存放至<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref>按一下控制項時。

trans-unit.source: The Click event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Click 事件引發時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>物件存放至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>按一下控制項時。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: To allow a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> to raise the Click event, you must first set either the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A> property on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A> property on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object to `HotSpotMode.Postback`.
trans-unit.target: 允許<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>引發 Click 事件，您必須先將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>控制項或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>物件`HotSpotMode.Postback`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: To programmatically control the actions performed when a postback <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> is clicked, provide an event handler for the Click event that contains the code to run when the event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 若要以程式設計方式控制執行動作時回傳<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>是按下，按一下事件，其中包含要引發事件時執行的程式碼提供的事件處理常式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派事件處理常式叫用。

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 使用事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the control can respond to user interaction.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出控制項是否可回應使用者互動。

trans-unit.source: With the Enabled property, you can enable or disable the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control at run time.
trans-unit.target: 已啟用屬性後，您可以啟用或停用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>控制項在執行階段。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is to respond to user clicks; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果控制項是以回應使用者按鍵動作;否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default behavior for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> objects of an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> objects are clicked.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的預設行為<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref>物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref>負責控制何時<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref>按一下物件。

trans-unit.source: Use the HotSpotMode property to specify the default click behavior of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> objects within an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control.
trans-unit.target: 按一下 HotSpotMode 屬性，指定預設的行為使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>物件內<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: This property is set using one of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotMode> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會設定使用其中一種<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotMode>列舉值。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotMode>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the possible values.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出可能的值。

trans-unit.source: |Item|Description| |----------|-----------------| |`Inactive`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object does not have any behavior.| |`NotSet`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object uses the behavior set by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control's HotSpotMode property.
trans-unit.target: |項目 |描述 | |----------|-----------------| |`Inactive`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>物件沒有任何行為。 | |`NotSet`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>物件會使用行為來設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>控制項的 HotSpotMode 屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control does not define the behavior, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> objects all navigate to a URL.| |`Navigate`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> objects navigate to a URL.| |`PostBack`|The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> objects generate a postback to the server.| You can specify a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object's behavior using either the HotSpotMode property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of each individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot><xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>控制項未定義的行為，如果物件所有瀏覽至 URL。 | |`Navigate`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>物件瀏覽至 URL。 | |`PostBack`|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>物件產生回傳至伺服器。 | 您可以指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>物件的行為使用任一個的 HotSpotMode 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>控制項或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性的每個個別<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: If both properties are set, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property specified on each individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object takes precedence over the HotSpotMode property on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control.
trans-unit.target: 如果已設定這兩個屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>指定每個個別屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>物件的優先順序高於 HotSpotMode 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: When you set the HotSpotMode property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control, note that the `HotSpotMode.NotSet` and `HotSpotMode.Navigate` values have the same behavior: both navigate to a URL.
trans-unit.target: 當您設定的 HotSpotMode 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>控制項，請注意，`HotSpotMode.NotSet`和`HotSpotMode.Navigate`值有相同的行為︰ 同時瀏覽至 URL。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>

trans-unit.source: When you specify `HotSpotMode.NotSet` for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of an individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object, that <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> determines its behavior from the value of the HotSpotMode property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control.
trans-unit.target: 當您指定`HotSpotMode.NotSet`的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>個別<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>物件，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>決定其行為的 HotSpotMode 屬性的值從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you specify `HotSpotMode.Navigate` for the HotSpotMode property, the page navigates to a URL when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定`HotSpotMode.Navigate`HotSpotMode 的屬性頁面上，瀏覽至 URL 時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>按下。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.NavigateUrl%2A> property to specify the URL to navigate to.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.NavigateUrl%2A>屬性來指定要瀏覽至 URL。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.NavigateUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you specify `HotSpotMode.PostBack` for the HotSpotMode property, the page generates a postback to the server when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定`HotSpotMode.PostBack`HotSpotMode 的屬性頁面會產生回傳至伺服器時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>按下。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A> property to specify the name of the hot spot region.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A>屬性，以指定的作用點區域的名稱。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.PostBackValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: This name will be passed in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs> event data when a postback event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 此名稱將會傳入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs>時就會發生回傳事件的事件資料。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: When a postback <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> is clicked, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 當回傳<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>按一下時，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click>就會引發事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: To programmatically control the actions performed when a postback <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> is clicked, provide an event handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要以程式設計方式控制執行動作時回傳<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>是按下，提供的事件處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click>事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: If you specify `HotSpotMode.Inactive` for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object does not have any behavior when it is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 如果您指定`HotSpotMode.Inactive`如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>物件沒有任何行為按一下時其。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can use this value to create an inactive hot spot within a larger active hot spot.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用此值來建立較大的作用中作用中的非作用中作用。

trans-unit.source: This option is provided to allow you to create more complex hot spot zones within an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control.
trans-unit.target: 提供此選項可讓您建立更複雜的作用點區域內<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>

trans-unit.source: To create an inactive area within an active hot spot, you must specify the inactive hot spot before the active hot spot in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立作用中的作用中的非作用中區域，您必須指定非使用中的作用點之前在使用中的作用點<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>

trans-unit.source: For example, the following <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> defines an active ring by specifying an inactive circular hot spot within a larger active circular hot spot: ``` <asp:ImageMap ID="SaturnImage" ImageUrl="~/saturn.PNG" runat="server" OnClick="SaturnImage_Click"> <asp:CircleHotSpot AlternateText="planet" HotSpotMode=PostBack PostBackValue="planet" Radius=40 X=100 Y=100 /> <asp:CircleHotSpot HotSpotMode=Inactive Radius=60 X=100 Y=100 /> <asp:CircleHotSpot AlternateText="rings" HotSpotMode=PostBack PostBackValue="rings" Radius=80 X=100 Y=100 /> </asp:ImageMap> ``` To cause all <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> objects in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control to have the same behavior, use the HotSpotMode property on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control to specify the behavior.
trans-unit.target: 例如，下列<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>藉由指定非使用中的圓形作用點較大 active 圓形作用點內定義一個使用中的環形︰``` <asp:ImageMap ID="SaturnImage" ImageUrl="~/saturn.PNG" runat="server" OnClick="SaturnImage_Click"> <asp:CircleHotSpot AlternateText="planet" HotSpotMode=PostBack PostBackValue="planet" Radius=40 X=100 Y=100 /> <asp:CircleHotSpot HotSpotMode=Inactive Radius=60 X=100 Y=100 /> <asp:CircleHotSpot AlternateText="rings" HotSpotMode=PostBack PostBackValue="rings" Radius=80 X=100 Y=100 /> </asp:ImageMap> ```造成所有<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>中的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>控制項有相同的行為，請使用 HotSpotMode 屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>控制項以指定的行為。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>

trans-unit.source: Then, either set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A> property on each individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object to `HotSpotMode.NotSet` or do not specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 然後，設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A>上每個個別屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>物件`HotSpotMode.NotSet`或不指定值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: To specify different behaviors for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> objects in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property on each individual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object to either `HotSpotMode.Navigate`, `HotSpotMode.PostBack`, or `HotSpotMode.Inactive`.
trans-unit.target: 若要指定不同的行為，如<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>中的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>控制，請設定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>上每個個別屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>物件設為 `HotSpotMode.Navigate`， `HotSpotMode.PostBack`，或`HotSpotMode.Inactive`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control's HotSpotMode property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property on any of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> objects it contains is either set to `HotSpotMode.NotSet` or not set to a value, by default the behavior is `HotSpotMode.Navigate`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>控制項的 HotSpotMode 屬性或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName>上的任何屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>它所包含的物件會設定為`HotSpotMode.NotSet`或未設定為值，則行為是預設`HotSpotMode.Navigate`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotMode"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotMode"></xref>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_NotSet" name="NotSet" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_NotSet" name="NotSet" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified type is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotMode"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: 指定的型別不是其中一個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotMode"></xref>列舉值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref> objects that represents the defined hot spot regions in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot"></xref>熱代表已定義的物件找出中的區域<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Use the HotSpots property to programmatically manage the hot spot regions in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control.
trans-unit.target: 使用作用區屬性，以程式設計方式管理中的作用點區域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>

trans-unit.source: You can use the HotSpots property to add, insert, remove, and retrieve <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> objects.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用作用區屬性來加入、 插入、 移除及擷取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection"></xref> object that represents the defined hot spot regions in an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpotCollection"> </xref>物件，代表中定義的作用點區域<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Restores view-state information for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control from a previous page request that was saved by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.SaveViewState*> method.
trans-unit.target: 還原檢視狀態資訊<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref>控制項所儲存的先前頁面要求從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.SaveViewState*>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.SaveViewState*>

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法主要供.NET Framework 基礎結構，並不是直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: 不過，控制項開發人員可以覆寫這個方法，以指定自訂的伺服器控制項如何還原其檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control to restore.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>表示<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref>来還原的控制項。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: savedState is not a valid .
trans-unit.target: savedState不是有效。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click"></xref> event for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 引發<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> event is raised when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object in an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click>就會引發事件時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>物件存放至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>按一下控制項時。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click>

trans-unit.source: To allow a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> event, you must first set either the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A> property on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A> property on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object to `HotSpotMode.Postback`.
trans-unit.target: 允許<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click>事件，您必須先將<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>控制項或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>物件`HotSpotMode.Postback`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot.HotSpotMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派事件處理常式叫用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2)。

trans-unit.source: The OnClick method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: OnClick 方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是處理衍生類別中的事件的慣用的技巧。

trans-unit.source: An argument of type <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 類型的引數<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMapEventArgs"></xref>包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises events for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control when a form is posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref>控制表單回傳至伺服器時。

trans-unit.source: The page passes the value of the `eventArgument` parameter to the RaisePostBackEvent method of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control.
trans-unit.target: 頁面值傳遞給`eventArgument`RaisePostBackEvent 方法的參數<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> raises a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> event for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> object that was clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot>已按下的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HotSpot> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>

trans-unit.source: The argument for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件引數。

trans-unit.source: Sends the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control content to the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object, which writes the content to render on the client.
trans-unit.target: 傳送<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref>控制項內容到指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref>物件，以在用戶端上寫入要呈現的內容。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。

trans-unit.source: When developing a custom server control derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control, you can override this method to generate content for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>.
trans-unit.target: 當開發自訂的伺服器控制項衍生自的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>控制項，您可以覆寫這個方法，以產生<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>內容</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object that receives the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control content.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref>物件，可接收<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref>控制內容。

trans-unit.source: Saves any changes to an <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control's view-state that have occurred since the time the page was posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 將儲存的任何變更<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref>控制項的檢視狀態之後發生的時間頁面回傳至伺服器。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法主要由控制項開發人員使用。

trans-unit.source: View state is the accumulation of the values of a server control's properties.
trans-unit.target: 檢視狀態是伺服器控制項的屬性值的累積。

trans-unit.source: These values are automatically placed in the server control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A> property, which is an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> class.
trans-unit.target: 這些值會自動放入伺服器控制項的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>屬性，這是執行個體的<xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the server control life cycle.
trans-unit.target: 儲存狀態的伺服器控制項的生命週期的階段之後，這個屬性的值然後會保存到字串物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: When view state is saved, this string object is returned to the client as a variable that is stored in an `Hidden` HTML element.
trans-unit.target: 這個字串物件儲存檢視狀態時，會為儲存在變數傳回給用戶端`Hidden`HTML 項目。

trans-unit.source: When you author custom server controls, you can improve efficiency by overriding this method and modifying your server control's `ViewState` property.
trans-unit.target: 當您撰寫自訂的伺服器控制項時，您可以透過覆寫這個方法，並修改您的伺服器控制項來改善效率`ViewState`屬性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](../Topic/ASP.NET%20State%20Management%20Overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](../Topic/ASP.NET%20State%20Management%20Overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control's current view state.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref>控制項目前檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: If there is no view state associated with the control, this method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有與控制項關聯的檢視狀態，則這個方法會傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent*>.
trans-unit.target: 如需這個成員的說明，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent*>

trans-unit.source: Typically, you should use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.RaisePostBackEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to raise an event for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control when a form is posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 一般而言，您應該使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.RaisePostBackEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法，以引發事件，以供<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>控制表單回傳至伺服器時。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.RaisePostBackEvent%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent method is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: IPostBackEventHandler.RaisePostBackEvent 方法是明確介面成員實作。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它可用時，才<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>執行個體轉換成<xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler>介面。</xref:System.Web.UI.IPostBackEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>

trans-unit.source: The argument for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件引數。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the target window or frame that displays the Web page content linked to when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目標視窗或框架會顯示連結時之 Web 網頁內容<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref>按一下控制項時。

trans-unit.source: Use the Target property to specify the frame or window that displays the Web page r when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的框架或視窗顯示網頁 r 目標屬性時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>按一下控制項時。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>

trans-unit.source: The Web page is specified by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 網頁上設定，來指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Image.ImageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Target property is used when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A> property is `HotSpotMode.Navigate`; it is ignored when the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A> property is `HotSpotMode.PostBack`.
trans-unit.target: 目標屬性使用時的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A>屬性是`HotSpotMode.Navigate`; 會忽略此項時的值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A>屬性是`HotSpotMode.PostBack`。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap.HotSpotMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the Target property is not set, the browser or window with focus refreshes when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 如果未設定目標屬性，在瀏覽器或具有焦點的視窗會重新整理時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>按一下控制項時。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Target property renders as a `target` attribute.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Target 屬性轉譯成`target`屬性。

trans-unit.source: The `target` attribute on `anchor` elements is not allowed in the XHTML 1.1 document type definition.
trans-unit.target: `target`屬性`anchor`XHTML 1.1 文件類型定義中不允許項目。

trans-unit.source: Do not set the Target property if the rendered output for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> must be XHTML 1.1-compliant.
trans-unit.target: 如果要設定的目標屬性的轉譯的輸出<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>必須 XHTML 1.1 相容。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [XHTML Standards in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[XHTML 標準，在 Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > > When creating accessible Web pages, it is strongly recommended that you avoid using the Target property to target another window.
trans-unit.target: >> 時建立可存取網頁，強烈建議您避免使用的目標屬性指向另一個視窗。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Visual Studio 和 ASP.NET 中的協助工具](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The target window or frame that displays the specified Web page when the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 目標視窗或框架，顯示指定的 Web 網頁時<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref>按一下控制項時。

trans-unit.source: Values must begin with a letter in the range of A through Z (case-insensitive), except for the following special values, which begin with an underscore:
trans-unit.target: 值的開頭必須是字母的 A 到 Z 範圍 （不區分大小寫），除了下列的特殊值，以底線開頭中︰

trans-unit.source: Renders the content in a new window without frames.
trans-unit.target: 呈現在新視窗中沒有框架的內容。

trans-unit.source: Renders the content in the immediate frameset parent.
trans-unit.target: 呈現父代的 即時運算框架組中的內容。

trans-unit.source: Renders the content in the search pane.
trans-unit.target: 轉譯 [搜尋] 窗格中的內容。

trans-unit.source: Renders the content in the frame with focus.
trans-unit.target: 呈現具有焦點的框架中的內容。

trans-unit.source: Renders the content in the full window without frames.
trans-unit.target: 呈現框架不完整的視窗中的內容。

trans-unit.source: Check your browser documentation to determine if the <xref uid="langword_csharp__search" name="_search" href=""></xref> value is supported.
trans-unit.target: 請檢查您的瀏覽器文件，以判斷是否<xref uid="langword_csharp__search" name="_search" href=""></xref>支援值。

trans-unit.source: For example, Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 and later support the <xref uid="langword_csharp__search" name="_search" href=""></xref> target value.
trans-unit.target: 例如，Microsoft Internet Explorer 5.0 及更新版本都支援<xref uid="langword_csharp__search" name="_search" href=""></xref>目標值。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Tracks view-state changes to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref> control so they can be stored in the control's <xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 會追蹤檢視狀態變更<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap"></xref>控制以便可在控制項的儲存<xref href="System.Web.UI.StateBag"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: This object is accessible through the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: 這個物件是透過可存取<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A?displayProperty=fullName>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This method is called automatically by ASP.NET when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap> control is initialized.
trans-unit.target: 由 ASP.NET 自動呼叫這個方法時<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>初始化控制項時。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ImageMap>
